frontmatter.title: Layouts
frontmatter.description: Layouts are the common page layout patterns that can be reused.

internal.content:
--- title: Layouts description: Layouts are the common page layout patterns that can be reused. tabs: ["Usage", "Code"] --- Layouts can be used to quickly setup and design a page. These are the patterns that are common across web and Innovaccer's products. ### Templates Following templates are available for use to quickly setup and design a page. #### Blank template ![Blank template](./images/layouts-1.png)
**Example** ![Blank template example](./images/layouts-2.png)

#### Resource table template ![Resource table template](./images/layouts-3.png)
**Example** ![Resource table template example](./images/layouts-4.jpg)

#### Level 1 header template ![Level 1 header template](./images/layouts-5.png)
**Example** ![Level 1 header template example](./images/layouts-6.jpg)
**Nested grid** ![Nested grid example](./images/layouts-7.jpg)

#### Sidebar template ![Sidebar template](./images/layouts-8.png)
**Example** ![Sidebar template example](./images/layouts-9.png)

#### Patient bar template ![Patient bar template](./images/layouts-10.png)
**Example** ![Patient bar template example](./images/layouts-11.png)

#### Mini sidebar template ![Mini sidebar template](./images/layouts-12.png)
**Example** ![Mini sidebar template example](./images/layouts-13.jpg)

#### Content division ##### Full width ![Full width content division](./images/layouts-14.png)
**Example** ![Full width content division example](./images/layouts-15.jpg)

##### Narrow width content ![Narrow width content division](./images/layouts-16.png)
**Example** ![Narrow width content division example](./images/layouts-17.jpg)

These are the patterns that are common across web and Innovaccer's products. ### Templates Following templates are available for use to quickly setup and design a page. #### Blank template ![Blank template](./images/layouts-1.png)
